pros: Master of Damage over Time debuffs
cons: Short-ranged mobbing attack with Paralyze
Slow playstyle that requires preparation & setup to deal damage
Teleport Mastery will trigger Damage Reflect
Need to remember to toggle Magic Guard

baseStats: Excludes Hyper Skill Passives, Link Skills, Magic Guard and buffs with cooldowns
Final Damage: +40% + (up to 25% from Fervent Drain) + (up to 20% when attacking enemies affected by damage over time, stun, freeze, darkness, or paralysis)

linkSkill.desc: When attacking, your attacks have a chance to debuff against the enemy with the highest Max HP
details: [Debuff]: Increases %Damage and %Ignore DEF against this enemy (stacking up to 3 times)
Can be stacked up to 3 times, once for each unique Explorer Magician to reach Master Level

info: To create one, choose the 'Explorers' option in the Character Creation screen and then continue through the story until you reach the quest 'Victoria Island or Bust' and choose the 'Magician, intelligent and magical' option

Once you reach Lv. 30 as a Magician, talk to Grendel the Really Old to accept a quest called 'Path of Fire and Poison'. Completing the quest will make you a Wizard (Fire, Poison) and you will be on the path to an Arch Mage (Fire, Poison). Wizard (Fire, Poison) is the 2nd job of Arch Mage (Fire, Poison)

build: -> -> -> ->
-> -> -> -> -> -> ->
-> -> -> -> -> -> -> -> ->
-> -> -> -> -> -> -> -> ->
details: Put one SP into each skill first and then max each skill in this order
For any skills that have prerequisites, follow them first before following build path
4th Job skills require Mastery Books to reach Master Level

hyperBuild.recommended:
• Paralyze - Reinforce and Extra Strike
  • Mist Eruption - Reinforce, Guardbreaker, and Cooldown Cutter

extraContent.title: DoT Debuffs
extraContent.content:
Stacking DoT debuffs will increase the %Final Damage of Mist Eruption against an enemy. Below is a list of skills that apply DoT effects:

  • Poison Breath (2nd Job)
  • Ignite (2nd Job)
  • Poison Mist (3rd Job)
  • Viral Slime (3rd Job)
  • Teleport Mastery (3rd Job)
  • Paralyze (4th Job)
  • Flame Haze (4th Job)
  • Ifrit (4th Job)
  • Megiddo Flame (Hyper Skill)
  • DoT Punisher (5th Job)
  • Poison Nova (5th Job)

primary.name: Three Snails
primary.desc: Throws a snail shell forward that deals fixed amount of damage

primary.name: Recovery
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 15, Recover 72 HP over 30 sec

primary.name: Maple Return
primary.shortDesc: Returns you to Southperry Harbor on Maple Island.\nCooldown: 600 sec

primary.desc: Fires an explosive orb forward
When toggled, a portion of your damage taken will be redirected towards your MP
details: [Note]: Always remember to keep this toggled on

primary.desc: Teleports you in the direction you are moving in with your Arrow Keys
details: Can be used in the air and on ladders

primary.desc: Casts a fireball forward
details: Strong against Ice-Attribute enemies

primary.desc: Casts an orb forward that applies a damaging poison debuff
Increases Attack Speed (by 2 stages)
When toggled, there is a chance to create a wall of fire whenever you use Fire-Attribute attacks
details: Unaffected by damage reflect
Enemies that touch the wall gain a damaging burn debuff

primary.desc: Your attacks have a chance to steal a portion of the enemy's %Max HP
details: Does not apply to bosses

primary.desc: Creates an explosion around yourself
Releases a lingering poisonous fog that applies a damaging poison debuff
Summons a slime that seeks and attacks enemies
details: If the slime defeats an enemy, it will split into 2

primary.desc: Creates a barrier that blocks one Abnormal Status effect
details: Once an Abnormal Status is blocked, there is a chance for the barrier to regenerate up to 5 times
[Passive]: Permanently increases Abnormal Status Resistance and %Elemental Resistance

primary.desc: When toggled, when you use , nearby enemies will take damage
details: Has a chance to stun enemies and apply a damaging burn debuff
Permanently increases the teleport distance

primary.desc: When using Fire-Attribute attacks magic, your attack has a chance to reduce an enemy's MP and deal damage based on the MP consumed
details: Does not work if the enemy's MP is below 20%
Attack ignores enemy DEF

primary.desc: Releases a wall of flame in front of you that applies paralysis and a damaging burn debuff
Causes nearby to erupt and explode damaging nearby enemies
details: Damage of the explosion is increased based on how many DoT debuffs an enemy has active
Explosion has increased %Ignore DEF
[Passive]: Permanently increases %Damage of
Cooldown is slightly reduced if an enemy is hit by 5 or more explosions
Increases %Final Damage provided per stack

primary.desc: Creates a shower of meteors that rain down from the sky
details: [Final Attack]: While Meteor Shower is on cooldown, there is a chance your attacks cause for a meteor to strike a single enemy

primary.desc: Launches a deadly fireball forward at a single enemy that applies a damaging burning debuff
details: Enemies with the debuff cannot deal touch damage
will be automatically cast whenever you use Flame Haze

primary.desc: When active, your skills do not consume mana and you gain increased %Knockback Resistance and %Final Damage
details: Additionally while active, continuously increases %Final Damage and periodically restores %Max HP/MP
Unaffected by cooldown resets

primary.desc: Summons a fire golem that attacks nearby enemies that applies a damaging burn debuff
details: Unaffected by Damage Reflect
[Passive]: Increases %Weapon Mastery

primary.desc: Removes certain abnormal status effects and become immune to Abnormal Status for a few seconds
When attacking an enemy 3 or more times, you have a chance to gain a stacking %Damage buff
details: Summon attacks cannot trigger this effect
Additionally increases %Ignore DEF

hyperActive.desc: When toggled, creates an aura that damages nearby enemies
details: Unaffected by Attack Ignore and Damage Reflect

hyperActive.desc: Launches a fireball that seeks out a single enemy and applies a damaging burning debuff
details: Ignores Attack Ignore and Damage Reflect

fifthMain.name: DoT Punisher
fifthMain.shortDesc:
MP Cost: 500, Flame Orbs Created: 15, Damage Per Orb: 775%, Number of Attacks: 5, Duration: 20 sec
Flame Orb Damage: 275% damage every 1 sec for 8 sec
Summons 1 additional orb for every 1 of your damage over time stack(s) on enemies in range. Up to 25 Flame Orbs can be summoned in total.
When multiple orbs hit a single target, their damage is reduced by 35%, starting with the second orb.
Cooldown: 25 sec
fifthMain.desc: Releases multiple flame orbs that seek out enemies and applies a damaging burning debuff
details:
Summons additional orbs for every DoT debuff on enemies in range
  • Only up to a maximum of 25 Flame Orbs will be created
When multiple orbs hit a single target, their %Final Damage is reduced

fifthMain.name: Poison Nova
fifthMain.shortDesc: MP Cost: 500, Creates a number of poisonous clouds that deal 500% damage 12 times, and inflict an additional 600% damage every 1 sec for 10 sec. Enemies can only be struck by one poisonous cloud.\n2 sec or more after poisonous clouds are created, you can use Mist Eruption to detonate them, hitting up to 12 enemies dealing 450% damage 12 times. Explosion damage from poisonous clouds may stack, but if more than 3 are applied to a single enemy, the Final Damage for the additional explosions is decreased by 50%.\nCooldown: 25 sec
fifthMain.desc: Releases multiple poison orbs that spread out in all directions, poisoning any enemies it collides with
details:
After several seconds, you can detonate the orbs to explode with dealing massive damage
  • The orbs will change colors when they are ready to detonate

fifthMain.name: Elemental Fury
fifthMain.shortDesc: MP Cost: 1000, Damage: 400%, Max Enemies Hit: 12, Number of Attacks: 6, Attack Duration: 3 sec Duration increases 0.6 sec per 1 active Fervent Drain\nCooldown: 75 sec
fifthMain.desc: Summons a spirit of fire to attack nearby enemies
details: Duration is increased for each stack of
Can only be used when is active

fifthMain.name: Poison Chain
fifthMain.shortDesc:
MP Cost: 1000, Enemies Hit: 1, Damage: 600%, Number of Attacks: 4, Poison Duration: 20 sec. Explosion from poisoned enemy attacks 6 times with 300% damage periodically, and spreads to 2 enemies nearby that aren't poisoned.
Poison accumulates up to 5 times. Explosion damage increases 55%p each in proportion to the accumulated poison.
Explosion can occur up to 9 times on 1 enemy and p to 22 times on all enemies in total.
If it ended because the available explosions were used up, every poison is removed and there is an additional explosion.
Cooldown: 30 sec
fifthMain.desc: Casts a stacking poisonous debuff onto a single enemy that spreads to nearby enemies
details:
Debuffed enemies will periodically create a poisonous explosion that spreads the debuff
  • Debuff can stack up to 5 times, each time increases the %Damage of the poison explosion

Each enemy can only explode up to 9 times, and a total of 22 times across all affected enemies
  • If you reach maximum explosions, when the skill ends, all enemies will explode for a final explosion
Does not trigger Damage Reflect or

meta: Arch Mage (Fire, Poison) is an INT mage class part of the Explorers class group. They specialize in Damage over Time magic and dealing heavy damage with massive attacks
